Posts.Content: Oct 4, 2010 11:24AM mychoice321 wrote: Sorry to hear about your husband. He was fortunate to have you with him. I am divorced but I am involved with a wonderful man. Although we do not live together, he is very supportive. I have not started any treatments yet. My doc says I only need radiation. My first consult with the oncologist is Oct 20th. then I will start the radiation. I am already on pain meds for my back so I haven't felt much pain after the lumpectomy. Not looking forward to the radiation but atleast I don't have to do chemo.

Posts.Content: Sep 17, 2010 11:01AM mychoice321 wrote: Hello, I've just been diagnosis with stage 1 bc. You have alot of great suggestions on tracking your progress. Thanks so much for all your info. Good Luck to you & your husband.
